//  OJ: 洛谷
//  提交ID: 190532176
//  题目ID: T543226
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
//#define ONLINE
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
int n, p[30], a[30], idx, idxx;
ll db[] = { 0,102605682,378170718,813364696,1402405583,2140377129,3025989707,4054033648,5227795139,6540205660,7994482781,9584914007,11307060300,13176990028,15176437668,17310634535,19582743661,21980035976,24514314668,27175200880,29983105047,32902998416,35965414959,39152220941,42465571579,45923700641,49495048929,53194847694,57029747984,60994731576,65068049712,69287818746,73639519875,78108464756,82693080580,87417115440,92251219693,97221252246,102308834265,107532566235,112867531228,118341718127,123943104235,129641239339,135479337528,141437812452,147511047353,153757649595,160112089945,166543954503,173122287432,179823473929,186628063245,193567312398,200597544882,207791381303,215138005875,222542997041,230110441584,237780213904,245544577257,253488851637,261494818473,269661114236,277902394644,286302272358,294823714941,303455789424,312211730247,321058082738,330077138821,339165737203,348388237315,357781581376,367215458386,376826040898,386526773233,396331824239,406324060281,416276599221,426514319206,436843774978,447241055728,457789197714,468408844866,479158459449,490073208092,501095148003,512173750497,523412248094,534742774636,546309470114,557831473168,569517930346,581327289517,593331425644,605452982186,617527957220,629817559321,642220649198,654783798187,667377750671,680149800428,692985929361,706056112413,719122063929,732390032620,745658746586,759112762225,772716434404,786321928260,800185085381 };
constexpr int nwsz = 110;
signed main() {
#ifdef ONLINE
	freopen("divisor.in", "r", stdin);
	freopen("divisor.out", "w", stdout);
#endif
	cin.tie(0)->sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin >> n;
	ll anss = db[min(n / 25000, nwsz)];
	for (int x = min(n / 25000, nwsz) * 25000 + 1; x <= n; ++x) {
		idx = 0;
		int tmp = x;
		ll suma = 1;
		for (int i = 2; i*i <= x; ++i)
			if (tmp % i == 0) {
				p[++idx] = i; a[idx] = 0;
				while (tmp % i == 0)
					tmp /= i, a[idx]++;
				suma *= a[idx] + 1;
			}
		if (tmp > 1) p[++idx] = tmp, a[idx] = 1, suma *= 2;
		if (idx == 1) {
			anss += 1ll * p[1] * (1ll * a[1] * (a[1] + 1ll) / 2);
			continue;
		}
		ll ans = 0;
		for (int i = 1; i <= idx; ++i) {
			ans += suma / (a[i] + 1) * (1ll * a[i] * (a[i] + 1ll) / 2) * p[i];
		}
		anss += ans;
//		if (x % 25000 == 0) cout << anss << ',', cerr << ++idxx << endl;
	}
	cout << anss << endl;
	return 0;
}
//|p|<=10,a_i<=25
//80pts plz
